text: (Era kibagamba) nti mwegayirire Mukama omulabirizi wa mmwe era mumwenenyeze olwo nno ajja kubeeyagaza olweyagaza olulungi okutuusa ku kiseera ekigere era buli oyo yenna ateekeddwa okufuna obulungi agenda kumuwa obulungibwe, naye bwe muva ku ekyo mazima nze mbatiirira ebibonerezo by'olunaku oluzibu
